Package contextswitching

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    This class represents an agent to be scheduled for execution this must be an instance of Steppable in order to be added to the Mason Simulator Schedule, the scheduler basically executes the step method of each Steppable entity that is added
    Choices  
    ContextSwitchingConsole
    Basic GUI console that allows the model to be executed, stopped, loaded from a checkpoint and allows for the inspection of basic model properties
    ContextSwitchingModel
    A context switching model implemented in MASON The model stores the networks loaded from the configuration provided, the agent population and the Agent positions in the contexts
    ModelConfiguration
    Utility Class to wrap all the parameters used in the context switching model
    RunModel
    Simple Class to test the run of a model instance
